translation_clean: In summary, I and my partners have had a very good experience working together with our major investors over all these years. It wouldn't have been possible without the courage to find people who share our passion for winning.
reference: So I wound up doing very well, as did my partners, over all the years with these great investors that I would have never had if I hadn't had the confidence to get some scrappy person who really wanted to hustle.

source: Alati on võimalik raha hankida, kui usud, et sul on annet ja tunned oma osa maailmast paremini kui keegi teine.
translation_clean: It's always possible to earn money if you believe you have a gift and understand your part in the world better than anyone else.
reference: You can always get the money if you believe that you have a talent and you know your piece of the world better than anybody else.

source: Räägime hommikurutiinist. Mis on need kaks või kolm asja, mida te igal hommikul teete, mis aitavad teil edu saavutada?
translation_clean: Let's talk about our morning routine. What are those two or three things you do every morning that help you achieve success?
reference: Let's talk morning routine: What are two or three things that you do every single morning that set you up for success?

source: Laila Ali: Ma ei tea küll teie kohta, aga mul on elus palju hetki, mil ma tunnen end ülekoormatuna, olles ema, ärinaine, abikaasa... kõik need rollid, mida me naistena etendame.
translation_clean: "Laila Ali: I don't know much about you, but in life, I have many moments when I feel overwhelmed, being a mother, a working woman, a wife... all these roles that we women perform."
reference: Laila Ali: I don't know about you, but there are lots of times in my life where I feel overwhelmed, just being a mom, a businesswoman, a wife ... all the hats that we wear as women.

source: Jõudsin oma elus punkti, kus ma tõesti pidin hommikuse rutiini paika panema.
translation_clean: I reached a point in my life where I genuinely thought I had to stick to my morning routine.
reference: And I came to a point in my life where I really had to establish a morning routine.

source: Mulle meeldib üles tõusta ja lihtsalt tunda tänulikkust.
translation_clean: I enjoy rising up and simply feeling gratitude.
reference: I like to wake up and just feel gratitude.

source: Tänulikkust ülestõusmise, oma tervise, oma laste, oma pere eest.
translation_clean:
The translation of the Estonian text to English is:
"For the sake of education, for one's health, for one's children, for one's family."
reference: Gratitude for waking up, for my health, for my kids, for my family.

source: Kirjutan õhtuti tihti üles, mis on minu eesmärgid järgmiseks päevaks. Kui ärkan, siis vaatan seda nimekirja uuesti.
translation_clean: I'm writing down my goals for the next day quite often in the evening. When I wake up, I look at that list again.
reference: A lot of times in the evening, I'll write down what my goals are for the next day; When I wake up, I look at that list again.

source: Mediteerin.
translation_clean: The translation of "Mediteerin" from Estonian to English is "I meditate".
reference: I meditate.

source: Mõnikord kirjutan päevikusse.
translation_clean: I sometimes write in my diary.
reference: Sometimes I journal.

source: Joon alati tassi kohvi.
translation_clean: The translation of the Estonian text "Joon alati tassi kohvi" to English is "Joon always pours coffee".
reference: I always have a cup of coffee.

source: Ja alati teen hommikul esimese asjana trenni, sest kui ma seda siis ei tee, jääbki see tegemata.
translation_clean: And always do my morning training first, because if I don't do it then, it just won't get done.
reference: I always work out first thing in the morning, because if I don't, it won't get done.

source: Minu jaoks on asi lõppkokkuvõttes prioriteetides.
translation_clean: For me, the issue is in the final summary with priorities.
reference: To me, it really comes down to your priorities.

source: Need on asjad, mis on minu jaoks tähtsad: minu spirituaalsus, keskendumine universumile ja Jumalale, seejärel treenimine ning oma tervise esikohale seadmine.
translation_clean:
The translation of the Estonian text to English is:
"I have things that are important to me: my spirituality, focusing on the universe and God, then training, and putting my health first."
reference: Because those are the things that are important to me: my spirituality, centering with the universe and God, and then getting my workout in and putting my health first.
